message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, it's valued at $10000 by you. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $9500. This opportunity is tailored to provide you with significant savings while ensuring you receive unparalleled value. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to enhance your experience with our product.
